content: Hi, this is my first post so forgive any errors and omissions :) ... I would like to share some thoughts with the std:: library core team folks on possible security issues with the current behavior of std::path::{Path, PathBuf}::{push, join} ... which stream is the most appropriate one to be on efor it?
Normally the stream for conversations with the library team would be #t-libs, but if you've found security issues you want to disclose and discuss privately, that would need a different medium.
Thank you so much for replying, It's not a vuln, it's a behavior that has subtlties that could potentially lead to vulns.
I'd send an email to security@rust-lang.org, wait for a reply and post it here if it doesn't get acknowledged as sensitive.
